M

main(String[]) - Static method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This is the main method of the game, it creates and runs Trapomino, sets up the JFrame and the game's window, creates the ErrorHandle, and starts the game.
MainMenu - Class in trapomino
This class renders and checks for interactions with the buttons on the main menu.

makeBlocks(int, int, Position[]) - Method in class trapomino.Animal
This method sets the new X and Y coordinates and the new Positions of the Animal.

MapHandler - Static variable in class trapomino.ErrorHandle
 
Monkey - Static variable in class trapomino.Auxillary
 
Monkey - Class in trapomino
This class creates and manages the Grid Position, direction, and movement of a Monkey.
Monkey(int, int, Grid) - Constructor for class trapomino.Monkey
This Monkey constructor defines the necessary variables for use in the Monkey class.
MonkeyTrapped - Static variable in class trapomino.Auxillary
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method sets the X and Y coordinates of the mouse to the ones in the MouseEvent.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method overrides the MouseListener method so the class can be implemented.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method overrides the MouseListener method so the class can be implemented.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method overrides the MouseListener method so the class can be implemented.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class trapomino.Trapomino
This method overrides the MouseListener method so the class can be implemented.
mouseX - Static variable in class trapomino.Trapomino
 
mouseY - Static variable in class trapomino.Trapomino
 
move() - Method in class trapomino.Animal
This method will be expanded upon in each Animal child to move the Animal.
move() - Method in class trapomino.Bear
This method manages the movement of the Bear, the Bear will check if is able to move every 10 ticks.
move() - Method in class trapomino.Bird
This method manages the movement of the Bird, the Bird will move every 5 ticks.
move() - Method in class trapomino.Monkey
This method manages the movement of the Monkey, the Monkey will move every 45 ticks and will wait 3 iterations after moving again for 3 iterations in a row.
move() - Method in class trapomino.Penguin
This method manages the movement of the Penguin, the Penguin will move every 10 ticks.
move() - Method in class trapomino.Snake
This method manages the movement of the Snake, the Snake will move every 10 ticks.
moveCheck(Position[], int, int) - Method in class trapomino.Animal
This method sets the new X and Y coordinates of the position and then checks whether or not the Animal is able to move to the given new Position.
moveCheck(Position[], int, int) - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method checks whether or not the Tetromino can move to the given new Positions in the Grid.
moveDown() - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space down in the Grid.
moveDownAndClear(int) - Method in class trapomino.Grid
This method clears the row at the given Y coordinate and moves the rows above it down.
moveLeft() - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space left in the Grid.
moveRight() - Method in class trapomino.Tetromino
This method moves the Positions of the Tetromino's blocks one space right in the Grid.
